00044 class zlog{
00045           
00046           public function log($log){
00047                     
00048                     zlog::addtofile('SOAPLog.txt',$log);
00049                     
00050                     
00051           }
00052           
00053           public function errlog($log){
00054                     
00055                     zlog::addtofile('SOAPErr.txt',$errlog);
00056                     
00057                     
00058           }
00059 
00060           public function shelllog($errlog,$cmdlog){
00061                     
00062                     $errlog="errlog\n$errlog\n";
00063                     $cmdlog="errlog\n$errlog\n";
00064                     
00065                     zlog::addtofile('shelllogCMD.txt',$errlog);
00066                     zlog::addtofile('shelllogErr.txt',$cmdlog);
00067                     
00068           }
00069           
00070           function addtofile($file,$log){
00071                     if($debug){
00072                               echo "<pre>".$file."\n".$log."</pre>";
00073                     }else{
00074                               $file=dirname(__FILE__).'../log/'.$file;
00075                               
00076                               if(file_exists($file)){
00077                                         $f=file_get_contents($file);
00078                               }
00079                               $f=$log."\n\n".$f;
00080                               file_put_contents($file,$f);
00081                     }
00082           }
00083 }
